sentences.sContent: His was a utopian vision of nature in its purest form.
sentences.sCn: 他对大自然的看法是一种最纯粹的乌托邦式看法。

synos.tran: 乌托邦的；空想的；理想化的

phrases.pCn: 空想社会主义；乌托邦社会主义

words.tran: 空想的社会改良方案；乌托邦思想

trans.tranOther: Utopian is used to describe political or religious philosophies which claim that it is possible to build a new and perfect society in which everyone is happy
